oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Death of General Packenham
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Packenham falls back dead on a white horse while soldiers catch him. On the right, a British dragoon grappling with sword-wielding American. In the foreground, there is an pierced drum on the ground. Fighting in background at the Battle of New Orleans. "Battle of New Orleans - Death of General Packenham"
British commander-in-chief killed at the Battle of New Orleans, January 8, 1815, while leading an assault on the American line. Previously served in the Napoleonic War in Europe.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Packenham, Edward, 1778-1815
New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815;Southern States--History--War of 1812
